summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of First Avenue South, from Hanford Street to Dawson Street, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the deck of the existing trestle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4280 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
